thread.title: Catherine Chapman
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Catherine Chapman

author: Catherine Chapman
title: Catherine Chapman
text:
I purchased flowers for my sister in law that is recovering from hip surgery. I purchased the Everlasting Soothing Lavender Bouquet and when it arrived I received a picture from my sister in law saying Thank You and how beautiful it was and it truly had the lavender scent.
I was very satisfied with my order and extremely pleased with Avas Flowers.
Ps. Delivered on the right date just didn't get confirmation till the next day.
